name: Quatris - LD42 - Running out of Space
name_original: Quatris - LD42 - Running out of Space
description:
Made for #LDJAM42!

Theme: Running out of Space

The idea was taking boring old Tetris and adding a little twist to it. You can rotate the entire grid as well as the pieces! Pieces are generated from the middle, so try and keep that clean! If a line is formed up and down, the pieces connected will shift sideways instead of down. 

Created with LIBGDX in 48 hours by 1 dude!

Controls:

  • A - Move piece left
  • D - Move piece right
  • S - Drop piece faster
  • K - Rotate piece CCW
  • L - Rotate piece CW
  • I - Rotate grid CCW
  • O - Rotate grid CW
  • R - Restart or Retry

Source code available at:

https://github.com/MrLamont-HHSS/LDJAM42
